Step.Definition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <StorageObject xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <DefKey>45f3bc5a-1e0d-4237-bff1-2e6cea34c740</DefKey> <OutputTableData>[["A1_SVGP","ME","5","10RS01","Government grants within Mission Enterprises are down -$1.4 million, primarily driven by higher budgeted subsidy rates in Residential Aged Care and slower growth in the Home Care Program.","26ACTLDG"],["A1_SVGP","ME","5","10RS05","Mission Enterprises +$0.5 million within Aged care reflecting the timing of client income within the Retirement Living stream of Aged Care.","26ACTLDG"],["A1_SVGP","ME","5","20RS01","Employment Plus -$0.6 million hiring of new staff for new Inclusive Employment Services program; Salvos Stores -$0.6 million mainly for stores transitioned from Corps;","26ACTLDG"],["A1_SVGP","ME","5","20RS03","Mission Enterprises mainly timing of repairs and maintenance across Aged Care, Housing and setting up new sites within Salvos Stores","26ACTLDG"],["A1_SVGP","ME","5","20RS08","Mission Enterprises +$0.9 million mainly within Aged care related to timing of software maintenance and minor assets purchases within Residential Aged Care;","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","10RS01","Landfill Levy rebates higher than budget, consistent with higher than budget waste costs. Driven by donation volume.","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","10RS02","Stores sales growth not hitting budget assumptions, albeit same store growth on prior year +5.3% YTD. $1.5m of sales from stores not budgeted, net of stores budgeted but since closed, plus $0.7m upside from eCommerce and wholesale textile excesss, masking an underlying sales miss to budget from established stores. Starting to see an increase in average unit price relative to prior year (+2.7%) alongside an increase in average daily transactions (+3.6%) - important to keep the momentum with biggest risk to sales in Q4 of FY26.","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","20RS01","Impact of unbudgeted stores circa $1m","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","20RS02","Account classification issue re WINCS - some consumables and supplies accounts should be Trading Expenses","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","20RS03","Impact of unbudgeted stores $536k.","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","20RS04","Purchased Product for resale sales below budget, hence Cost of Goods Sold below budget, some consumables being charged into Programme/Welfare Expenses and Other Expenses","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","20RS06","Timing difference with truck replacement rollout assumptions","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","20RS07","True up of insurance allocations to actual wages spend. $90k related to Workers Comp premiums.","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","20RS09","Driven by postage costs for eCommerce channel being in excess of budget (sales also exceeding budget) and some auto classifications from WINC being different to where budgeted (Trading Expenses)","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","25RS01","Timing difference only - Doorways purchasing of EFTPOS enabled cards lumpy","26ACTLDG"],["A1_STYPE","STOR","5","25RS01","Relates to unbudgeted Corps Stores transitioned","26ACTLDG"]]</OutputTableData> </StorageObject>
Step.OutputTableDefinition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <TableDefinition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <DefKey>db344e0f-9a46-45de-9531-a1b38f09734a</DefKey> <Columns> <TableColumnDefinition> <DefKey>2cc637a1-8725-4bae-a232-acb00620ef5b</DefKey> <ColumnName>Code_Type</ColumnName> <ColumnType Description="String">STR</ColumnType> </TableColumnDefinition> <TableColumnDefinition> <DefKey>06a80875-4e87-49ca-8139-f13d60708a99</DefKey> <ColumnName>Code</ColumnName> <ColumnType Description="String">STR</ColumnType> </TableColumnDefinition> <TableColumnDefinition> <DefKey>4b916c1c-dbc6-457b-bcdd-61d106e50963</DefKey> <ColumnName>Period</ColumnName> <ColumnType Description="Integer">INT</ColumnType> </TableColumnDefinition> <TableColumnDefinition> <DefKey>f38a96b2-e1f2-42e1-be3a-421e425fd9ca</DefKey> <ColumnName>Summary_Code</ColumnName> <ColumnType Description="String">STR</ColumnType> </TableColumnDefinition> <TableColumnDefinition> <DefKey>8973e88b-5e08-4de4-a40d-045891e2d56a</DefKey> <ColumnName>Commentary</ColumnName> <ColumnType Description="String">STR</ColumnType> </TableColumnDefinition> <TableColumnDefinition> <DefKey>b7fdb21b-c014-40dd-a0bb-f5d89fa05b71</DefKey> <ColumnName>Ledger</ColumnName> <ColumnType Description="String">STR</ColumnType> </TableColumnDefinition> </Columns> <SortColumns /> <HasDynamicColumns IsAssigned="false" /> </TableDefinition>
Step.Name: Create Table

Step.Definition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <StorageObject xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <DefKey>bf199ca3-0dfc-442f-a0fb-74ed8a42e328</DefKey> <InputTableName>TMP_COMMENTS</InputTableName> <SuiteId Description="Core Enterprise Suite">CES</SuiteId> <WarehouseName Description="Aligned Financial Reporting Governance Data">AFRG</WarehouseName> <TableName Description="Comments">AFRG_B_COMMENTS</TableName> <ImportOption Description="Insert Only">I</ImportOption> <ColumnMapping> <TableColumnMapping> <ColumnName>Code_Type</ColumnName> <MappedValue>[Code_Type]</MappedValue> </TableColumnMapping> <TableColumnMapping> <ColumnName>Code</ColumnName> <MappedValue>[Code]</MappedValue> </TableColumnMapping> <TableColumnMapping> <ColumnName>Period</ColumnName> <MappedValue>[Period]</MappedValue> </TableColumnMapping> <TableColumnMapping> <ColumnName>Summary_Code</ColumnName> <MappedValue>[Summary_Code]</MappedValue> </TableColumnMapping> <TableColumnMapping> <ColumnName>Commentary</ColumnName> <MappedValue>[Commentary]</MappedValue> </TableColumnMapping> <TableColumnMapping> <ColumnName>Ledger</ColumnName> <MappedValue>[Ledger]</MappedValue> </TableColumnMapping> <TableColumnMapping> <ColumnName>Id</ColumnName> <MappedValue>[Id]</MappedValue> </TableColumnMapping> </ColumnMapping> </StorageObject>
